summary: DEFECT IN DESIGN OF THE FRONT BRAKE SYSTEM OF 2008 LIFAN GY200 MOTORCYCLE. THE FRONT BRAKE PADS DO NOT MAKE 100% CONTACT WITH ROTOR AND AFTER WARE PADS WILL CONTACT AND IMPEDE BRAKE OPERATION. THE PAD ON THE PISTON SIDE OF THE FRONT CALIPER IS NOT HELD TO THE PISTON AND ALLOWED TO RATTLE CAUSING NOISE AND DRAG ON THE FRONT ROTO. IF THE PAD WHERE TO BECOME JAMMED SIDEWAYS IN THE PISTON BORE THE BRAKES COULD LOCK UP AND CAUSE A CRASH. *TR
